welcome_message_body: Welcome to Catania, a city known for its vibrant atmosphere, rich history, and stunning architecture. Get ready to explore the charming streets, delicious cuisine, and beautiful coastline. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at NAS Sigonella Airport handles all commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at NAS Sigonella Airport is used for military operations and flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
